column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I had the pork ramen bowl and fried pork dumplings. The food all tasted good...it was clear the dumplings are homemade and you get a good amount (8) for the price ($5.50). The reason I give them four stars is because
column3: the two times I've been they have had significant problems. The first time the dough wasn't all the way cooked
column4: it was raw in some of the dumpling folds (the table next to me also ordered the dumplings and they looked perfect). I've included a picture of my dish. The second time
column5: the dumplings looked as though they hadn't been friend. None of the skins were crisp or bubbly
column6: they were just drenched in oil and sticking together.
